definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: He raised spear, aim at old sister-in-law, put down again.
sentences.chinese: 他举起了长枪，瞄准陈大嫂，又放下。

sentences.english: Hand over the pike hand in hand I dare stone.
sentences.chinese: 把手中的长枪递到了石敢当手中。

sentences.english: Scotland's army will be a mixed bag of solid lowland spearmen and fierce but unreliable highlanders .
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰的军队由低地长枪兵和高地人构成。

sentences.english: The spear went into his intestines and basically did a number on his lower half.
sentences.chinese: 长枪戳穿了他的肠子，而且基本上重创了他的下半身。

sentences.english: I dare stone in LiuJianGong encouragement again strong vibration spirit lifted the pike.
sentences.chinese: 石敢当在刘建功的鼓励再次强振精神举起了长枪。

sentences.english: We think he'll still beat pikemen, but not as well.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为他仍能打得过长枪兵，但实际非也。

definition: halberd/long-handled weapon with pointed tip and crescent blade/combined spear and battle-ax
ancient spear-like weapon with a wavy spearhead like a snake's body
